review: Works Great. Setup was very easy except for the last step. Last step is to put batteries into remote. I could not get the battery cover off. Tried every which way, even prying with a knife. I gave up and brought it to a friend figuring i was doing something stupid. Not true! he finally pried it open & we put the batteries in. WORKS GREAT !!!!  I hope the batteries last a long time because I tried to re-open the battery compartment and had NO luck. I hope I don't break it when the batteries run low.

Why on earth produce a product that has such poor quality and then sell it!  And by the way, it is right next to the router - also, other devices have no problems in the same network.  One lousy, lousy, rotten, useless product.  Thanks Amazon.
